_header: God o love has His cleping
_description: An Exposition of the Creed, in some MSS of Cursor Mundi — 58 couplets

BodFair14.First Lines:
Þis ilk lorde & cumli kingcertis he louis al maner
                    þing…
BodFair14.Last Lines:
…in þis ilk trauþ þi hert þou liftþou
                    þat wille come to riȝtwis shrift
BodFair14.Note: Follows a prose English version of the Crede.

BLCottVesAIII.First Lines:
Godd o luue has his clepingffor qui þat he luues al
                    thing…
BLCottVesAIII.Last Lines:
…In þiskin troth agh þou be tiftÞat wil her cum
                    to rightwis scrif

GottingenTheo107.First Lines:
god of luve has his clepingFor qui þat he luues of
                    alkin thing…
GottingenTheo107.Last Lines:
…In þi skin truth an þu be tiftþu þat will
                    cum to rightwis schrift
